Text: Please be aware that I am trying to prioritise seeding those who already have the majority of the game already downloaded, so that more seeds are created. I am having trouble seeding to everyone, so please be patient.
which one of the 32 & 64 bit versions of the crack do i use. my os is 64 bit but my program looks like its 32?
@lv2bll54 , the cracks are for the type of OS you are running, so in your case, you would use the 64-bit crack.

Quick update: I have had a massive corruption of one of my Hard Drives, which is why I have not been replying recently, obviously this means that a great deal of work was lost, but it also means that I will not around for a few weeks, as I need to re-write all of the programs that I have made over the years, as well as get a new Hard Drive to replace the old one. Hopefully the information on this page, and the other pages, are enough for users to know how to install the updates. I will be back soon,
